column4: Please someone suggest any improvements http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/3067
seems fine
Thanks
create a session file in /etc/gdm/sessions . that way it shows up in your gdm login
I did. I used gnome.desktop from /etc/gdm/xsessions as template. But it doesn't show. Also please note that project looking glass needs that an X server is not running already.
yeah, but did you restart gdm with a 'sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart' ?
I restarted my machine. O:-)
okay, do this. http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/3690 is the stuff u need to put in /etc/gdm/Sessions
btw, did you make the file executable with a chmod +x <file> ?
Which file?
for a 'session' to show up in the gdm login screen, you need to put the file in /etc/gdm/Sessions/<file with session name> <- this file needs to be executable.
the stuff to put in there is at http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/3691
thanks.
cool
Can't try now. At office. Will have to try at home. Will let you know tomorrow.
ty, it should work though. it works for me :)
Have you tried it with Project Lokking Glass?
want to , but am not going to do it. my machine is pretty slow
will be back in some time.
looked at the screenies, pretty neat.
